name: International Federation of Film Distributors' Associations
goal:
The International Federation of Film Distributors’ Associations (FIAD) represents national associations of film distributors operating in the majority of European Union Member States as well as globally.

FIAD members cover a range of different companies from SMEs specialised in art house films to larger companies dealing with mainstream films. These companies are involved in several aspects of film distribution: marketing, dubbing, subtitling, advertising and prints. Some also manage video and television rights and have activities in film production and theatrical exhibition. With such a representative and multi-national industry, it is important for the association to represent distributors’ interests at the European level.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Copyright and Related Rights; IPR Enforcement; Creative Europe; State Aid; AVMSD; Digital Agenda; Circulation of Films; Release Windows; VAT Harmonization
